manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why We Need Msccea First Aid Kit? When injuries occur, it is important to have a well-equipped first aid kit to hand. We build emergency and survival first aid kits that you can use in your daily life for home, road trips, travel, office, school, sports, workplace, camping, boating, kayaking, hiking and any other adventure you can think of. Whether you're traveling the world or just venturing outdoors for the day, your safety is vital.

Why Did You Choose This First Aid Kit? ✔ VALUE You will find that the quality of the items in our kit is higher than any other product on the market. ✔DESIGN Lightweight and compact, but can still accommodate everything needed for unexpected events in life. ✔QUALITY We have first-aid kits with high-quality first-aid supplies for emergency and survival situations.

Portable and Compact The Msccea 97 Piece Compact First Aid Kit is your essential companion for all first aid needs. Its compact size and organized layout allow for easy identification and swift access to the items you require. This versatile and easy-to-use first aid kit is an essential item for any individual, family, or organization prioritizing safety and readiness.

SPECIFLCATIONS INCLUDE: ⑴1X Bandage Triangulaire 96 * 96 * 136cm (Triangular bandage is used to bandage and fix wounds) ⑵40X cotton swabs (bags) ⑶1X pbt elastic bandage (5cm*4.5m) 1 roll (repair and fix the wound at the wound) ⑷1X non-woven tape (1.25x450cm (1 roll) ⑸4X sterile gauze piece (5x5cm) ⑹10X safety pin (3 cm) ⑺1X hook waterproof nylon bag ⑻4X iodine cloth ⑼20X Band-Aid (7.2 * 1.9 cm) ⑽1X scissors ⑾1X elastic bandage (tourniquet, size: 2.5cm x 46cm) ⑿1X aluminum alloy safety whistle ⒀1X stainless steel tweezers/tweezers ⒁10X alcohol pad ⒂1 X First aid instructions

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: I got this for summer vacation since we were in an AirBnB with 11 other people—figured it would be wise to bring a kit. It’s so compact and I also bring it on outdoor excursions and events now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for the rzr
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for the rzr hopefully we don’t ever have to use it but ordered just incase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable and Waterproof
reviews.reviewText: We bought bunch of these to distribute to hiking and kayak leaders so they will always have a small first aid kit that will be easy to carry and have just the basic first aid supplies needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for traveling
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this first aid kit for someone going abroad. I was happy with the amount of items within the packet, and OK with the quality of the scissors. I would recommend it for a new anyone looking for small first aid kit that could stick in a purse or pocket or carry-on but probably better in the check luggage considering the scissors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy travel size
reviews.reviewText: Always be prepared on family road trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Personal size first aid
reviews.reviewText: This is a great size for a first aid kit on the go! It has a clip and could fit in a small bag, Fanny pack, glove box or boat storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Small box that is great deal for your bugour bag or backpack. Definitely worth the money!!! I got one for all our bugout bags.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good first aid kit for travel.
reviews.reviewText: Compact first aid kit. Perfect for my backpack. There is everything you need for abrasions and scratches.
